bugReport.Summary: Displaying a characteristic associated with a deleted group

Precondition.two: Switch the mode to store management (store_url/admin/home)
Precondition.three: In the sidebar, expand the 'Catalog' list
Precondition.five: Characteristics "Test", "Test 1", "Test 2" are included in the group of characteristics "Overall dimensions"
Precondition.six: The subgroup "Groups of characteristics" is opened

StepsToReproduce.one: Click on the kebab menu next to the group 'Dimensions'
StepsToReproduce.two: Select the "Delete" menu in the kebab

ActualResult.two: When switching to the "Characteristics" tab, the characteristics "Test", "Test 1", "Test 2" are displayed with binding to the deleted group

ExpectedResult.two: When switching to the "Characteristics" tab, the characteristics "Test", "Test 1", "Test 2" are displayed without binding to the remote group
